column4: Video Ads Specifications | LinkedIn Marketing Solutions

Linkedin Carousel Ads can have a maximum of 10 images.
If you need more than 5 images, you can copy and paste the rows further. (To add more images, simply copy the rows with the existing images and paste them below.)

Image will be needed if the desired event is not present on the LinedIn Page
Image will be pulled from the Event page.
Event URL: Required, LinkedIn Event page URLs only
